'''Inoue''' {{Lang|ja=井上}} is a [[Doushin]] for the [[Tenryou Commission]]. He can be seen patrolling outside the Tenryou Commission's headquarters in [[Inazuma City]], [[Inazuma]].

===Appearance===
Inoue wears a standard uniform modeled from the {{Lang|''ashigaru''|ja=足軽}} of feudal Japan. He wears a purple-gray ''shitagi'', gray ''kobakama'', white socks, and ''waraji'' sandals. His eggplant-colored armor with gray accents consists of ''dou'' (breastplate) with the [[Inazuma Shogunate]]'s crest, ''han-kote'' (half-armored sleeves), ''haidate'' (thigh guards), and ''sune-ate'' (greaves). He is equipped with a ''juumonji yari'' (cross-shaped spear), whose shaft is lavender colored, and contains the Shogunate crest under the spearhead.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Inoue:''' Traveler, what business do you have here? No outlanders are allowed to enter.
:{{DIcon}} Tell me about the headquarters of the Tenryou Commission...
::'''Inoue:''' The headquarters of the Tenryou Commission is an important Shogunate facility. It maintains law and order across Inazuma, and executes every order from the Almighty Shogun.
::'''Inoue:''' As such, it is my duty to interrogate every person coming in and out. Those who cannot explain their identity and intentions shall not enter.
:{{DIcon}} Have you ever seen someone who looks like me?
:;(Before completing [[Transient Dreams]])
:::'''Inoue:''' Hmm? An outlander? I have never seen one. We rarely have outlanders coming in. I would have remembered, had I seen one.
:;(After completing Transient Dreams)
:::'''Inoue:''' Hmm? An outlander? Nope. I mean, I would have remembered, had I seen one."
::'''Inoue:''' Please go to the Hanamizaka Police Station if you mean to lodge a report about a missing person.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Inoue:''' Goodbye. Glory to the Shogun and her everlasting reign! Please don't come back if you have no business here.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Event Dialogue==
===Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival===
====Dialogue Set #1====
''Available between completing [[As Though Caught in a Dream]] and [[As Though Beholding Illusions]]''
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Inoue at the street food stall)
:'''Inoue:''' Glory to&mdash; Err, glory to creative food, am I right? Come try some! Milk Tea Medley, Colorful Dango, and everyone's beloved, uh...
:{{DIcon}} [[Dango Milk]]?
:{{DIcon}} Dango Milk.
:'''Inoue:''' Right, that! Yeah! Thank you for the reminder. Goodness, memorizing such uncommon foods sure is tiring...
{{Dialogue End}}

====Dialogue Set #2====
''Available after completing [[As Though Beholding Illusions]]''
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Inoue at the street food stall)
:'''Inoue:''' Finally, I'm free from having to cook all these weird creative dishes... Ugh, but I do miss them now, somehow...
:'''Inoue:''' *cough* Anyway, should you fancy it, do come back and have some Dango Milk once you and our Almight Shogun return victorious!
{{Dialogue End}}
